options.name: Apprentice Alchemist
options.description: You have learned the fundamentals of mixing reagents and brewing potions. Gain +1 skill with alchemy.

options.name: Volatile Brews
options.description: You specialize in creating harmful substances using the victim's own biology against them. Gain +1 skill with medicine knowledge. The check to recover from the effects of poisons you create can never drop below a 4.

options.name: Healing Draughts
options.description: You specialize in beneficial concoctions. Gain +1 skill with wildcraft knowledge. Healing potions you craft restore an additional die of health.

options.name: Careful Mixing
options.description: Your precise methods create more potent results. Gain +1 skill with concentration. Potions you craft are harder to resist, with their required checks increased by 1.

options.name: Action : Quick Application
options.description: You apply a poison or potion to a weapon or piece of ammunition as part of an attack action.

options.name: Action : Spash Zone
options.description: You throw a potion or elixir a short (10 units) distance at an creature, activating it as if they had consumed it. The potion or elixir can also target a separate adjacent creature.

options.name: Skilled Alchemist
options.description: Your alchemical skills have reached professional levels. Gain +1 skill with alchemy. When making alchemy checks, any roll under a 4 becomes a 3.

options.name: Efficient Potions
options.description: You rely on experience when creating potions to increase the amount of product you make. You gain +1 logic. Additionally, the Batch Brewing infusion is always applied to your alchemy crafts, but the check is rolled separately as a single alchemy dice where a failure does not impact you negatively.

options.name: Chemist
options.description: You are skilled in identifying and experimenting with alchemy. Gain +1 skill with academics and a bonus dice to checks to identify alchemical substances. Additionally, when attempting a recipe for the first time, if you roll an academics check greater than or equal to the check required by the recipe, you eliminate the first-time penalty.

options.name: Legendary Alchemist
options.description: You have achieved mastery over the alchemical arts. Gain +1 talent and +1 skill with alchemy. When making alchemy checks, any roll under a 6 becomes a 5.
